import requests
import json

def translate(text):
    url = "https://libretranslate.com/translate"

    payload = {
        "q": text,
        "source": "en",
        "target": "zh-CN"
    }

    headers = {
        "Accept": "application/json"
    }

    response = requests.post(url, data=payload, headers=headers)
    json_data = json.loads(response.text)
    return json_data["translatedText"]
